summary: This module implements a graph neural network using DGL and PyTorch. It defines a model class that constructs the network layers, executes message‑passing across the graph, and produces node embeddings or predictions. A supporting module encapsulates the core neighbor‑aggregation logic used during the forward computation.
business_intent: Provide a reusable GNN implementation that can be integrated into applications needing graph‑structured data processing, such as social network analysis, recommendation engines, or scientific graph modeling.
